name: Yuji Mai
description: "Yuji" is a series of fonts digitizing handwriting by the calligrapher Yuji Kataoka. Yuji Mai expresses a free, unrestrained, emotional beauty. The Latin alphabets were written to match the kana strokes. Fonts in the Yuji Family: Yuji Boku Yuji Syuku To contribute to the project, visit github.com/Kinutafontfactory/Yuji
author: Kinuta Font Factory
